title: Rescue the gnome
content:
, you can ask the goblins what they're doing with the gnome. Afterwards, demand they release the gnome and you'll be met with four options:

[INTIMIDATION] I won't let you harm a defenceless being - not without a fight. [PERSUASION] All of you lot against one deep gnome? You should find a better target. [DETECT THOUGHTS] Read the goblin's mind. [ILLITHID] [WISDOM] You will release the gnome. That's an order.

If you choose the second option, you'll have to pass a DC 15 Persuasion Check. Succeed,
